mapper.select: select * from Rooms r left outer join Bookings b on b.rooms_id = r.idRooms join RoomTypes rt on rt.idRoomTypes = r.roomTypes_id where rt.roomType = #{roomType}
mapper.insert: insert into Rooms(idRooms, hotels_id, floor, roomNumber, roomTypes_id, description, roomStatus) values (#{idRooms}, #{hotels_id}, #{floor}, #{roomNumber}, #{roomTypes_id}, #{description}, #{roomStatus})
